title: carrying bags for AT
content: They said no bags allowed, will there not be any cloakroom or anything to keep bags?

comments.body: If it rains all the water will come down hill towards the cricket ground ðŸ˜­ if they make any cloak room in be block/gjbc it will be a hassle to get there itself
Man I hope they organise well this time unlike last time n that bad kannada koota concert.. with the expected rain it's gonna go south if not
No cloak rooms or anything to keep bags

Nothing.  
They will make you keep it outside
Wait but I can get my phone and stuff inside no
You should be able to get your phone, wallet and keys in no problem
